data.title: True Vintage Experience
data.text: Great evening, start to finish. The staff were gracious and knowledgeable. Ben was helpful navigating their extensive wine list. Every course of our meal was fresh & flavorful. We had a romantic table for two. Including outdoor seating, they can only seat about 40 people, so call for a reservation. Owner Manuel show old-school class by greeting and thanking all visitors. It will be our go-to place when we are in the Gator Nation.

data.title: Lovely place, great food
data.text: So glad I read TA and made a reservation. We had a show to see and really did not have enough time to really enjoy the full ambiance of our visit. Our waiter, Chris was excellent, his recommendations were spot on. The food was superb, it really did feel like we were back in Little Italy enjoying a great meal. We will definitely be back, with more time to make this the highlight of the evening

data.title: Thought I was back in Italy!
data.text: Beautifully prepared, presented and delicious meal. Caesar salad was large with crispy Romaine lettuce and nice crispy chunky croutons. Pasta with pesto and shrimp (one of the specials that night) was excellent...so was my friend's steak and another friend's pasta. They also enjoyed the snails. No loud noisy corny music. Excellent wait staff.   Be sure to make a reservation. What's not to love?

data.title: One of the best experiences ever!
data.text: Holy smokes folks.  Got right in excellent service from entire team.  Extensive wine list, proper red wine crystal.  Started with poached pear purses, outstanding.  The on to lobster ravioli, used bread to soak up the plate.  One of the best experiences ever.  Manuel came by to thank me for dining here, what a wonderful gesture.

data.title: Quaint atmosphere, good food
data.text: The biggest compliment I can give this place is that it feels like one of those nice quaint, owner run restaurants that you would find in a major city. Very good Italian fare, with an engaged team that seems like they have been there a while. They have been very willing to accommodate my custom (and sometimes odd) requests. The food isn't super creative but it very well done.  Probably one of the nicest places in Gainesville and worth the high ranking.

data.title: Hidden Gem in downtown Gainesville
data.text:
I've been coming to Gainesville for years, never impressed with the dining options here.  But a client alerted me to Manuel's and could not believe I hadn't been yet. So I made a reservation for two and went at 7pm on a Tuesday night.

It's a small place in a row of storefronts downtown, easy to miss.  I walked over but there is on-street parking and valet parking from the downtown merchants.  Walked in, was immediately struck by the old-time vibe, a small dining romm that maybe holds 50 guests.  Shown to my table, service was instantaneous, wine list and menu provided as well.  Owner came by, welcomed us and recognized my guest as a previous patron, always a nice touch.  Warm bread was average, a bit of olive oil helped.  Specials we're read, my guest and I ordered salads first, my Caesar was excellent, her Arugula looked great, I'm not an Arugula fan so could not judge.   I ordered one of the specials, shrimp and Capellini with spinach and tomato, tossed in Olive oil.  It was excellent and a very large portion.  My guest ordered the Lobster Ravioli, since her plate was clean at the end I assume it was good.  She pronounced it fantastic!  No dessert, but two Coffee Americano''s ordere, the waiter cautioned us that it would take a moment as they brew fresh for each party.  It was indeed fresh and hot.  Check came, $160 for two, including an $80 bottle of wine, bottled water and a beer.  Definitely worth it.  Seek out Manuel's Vintage Room for a great meal and exceptional experience.

data.title: Top 3 options for a sophisticated date night in Gainesville
data.text:
Pear purses. Eat them. You're welcome. No further description necessary.
As for the rest of the experience, the wait staff if very knowledgeable and professional. The small group works as a team, which is refreshing, compared to other high-end eateries that are somewhat cutthroat. Wine list lacks imagination and variety in comparison with the food. The snails were average. My duck was medium rare perfection, but my wife's pasta entree was over-sauced and over-seasoned. Overall, you are spending your money well if you take in a night with the team at Manuel's.

data.title: Wonderful experience
data.text: Had dinner here for our first time! Had the steak and it was as good as any one will find in Gainesville! Comfortable and relaxing couples atmosphere with exceptional customer service. Very friendly staff. Price was worth the excellent food and service. Have a business dinner coming up? Impress them here. We will be going back soon!

data.title: Great food!
data.text: Intimate setting. Great food. Awesome for a special occasion. Service is top as well. Want to come again soon

data.title: Enchanting, Charming & Delightful
data.text: Mouthwatering, enjoyable and appealing to the eye and belly; wonderful would highly recommend for friends, family, business, goes above and beyond. Service was excellent; food was to die for; atmosphere perfect. Highly recommend!

data.title: Really good.. Maybe not quite great
data.text: Got sat at a too-small 2-top in this crowded little restaurant.  Asked for lemon for our waters...uh, not so much. House Merlot was quite nice. Meals were attractively served, but unremarkable.  Manuel himself came over personally to say hello...we told him it was our 45th wedding anniversary, but no recognition. Oh well, pretty nice night overall.

data.title: Best restaurant in Gainesville
data.text: Every aspect of this restaurant is fantastic. The atmosphere is quaint, sophisticated, and romantic. The food is amazing- every dish I've had has been delicious. The wine list is diverse, and the service is impeccable. Manuel's vintage room is the perfect spot to celebrate a birthday, anniversary, graduation, or other special occasion. It's also by far the best restaurant for a romantic dinner for you and your significant other.

data.title: An outstanding gem in Gainesville
data.text:
I had the pleasure of dining here recently while in town on business.   What a truly spectacular dining experience!  As soon as you walk into this lovely restaurant in the heart of Gaineville's downtown you are transported to an Italian trattoria with its brick walls, burnished wood floors, Italian inspired menu, and an extensive and exquisite wine selection.

We started with the pear purses which were poached pear and ricotta filled pasta purses in a herbed brown butter cream sauce - absolutely D-Lish!!  We really struggled to decide what we wanted for our entrees because there are too many wonderful choices so we decided to share the apple salad and macadamia chicken which were both excellent.  And then we shared a dessert that was just sublime.

The service was beyond attentive, friendly, and helpful with no less than 4 fabulous servers going out of their way to make sure we had everything we needed and that we were enjoying our meal.  Besides the amazing food, the highlight of the night was when Manuel himself came over to our table and genuinely and sincerely asked about our meal and warmly shook and kissed our hands.  He even took a picture with us and was truly delighted to do so.

This is one of those restaurants that should not be missed if ever in Gainesville.  It is an outstanding gem!

data.title: Last Friday night
data.text:
We set a reservation at 8:00 for a party of 12
The restaurants service was Excellant and Chef Marco's food was "fantastic".
One of the best meals I have had in Gainesville in some time!

data.title: Great place for dinner
data.text: Five of us went to Manuel's on a Friday night. The resturant was packed. We did make reservations before time. The resturant is small only about 10-15 tables. The food was delicious and the dinners were large portions. All dinners were al la cart. We had the chictken Marsala $19, shrimp & shrooms $21, lamb bolo $22, pasta Della casa $21, half order of pasta $11, apple salad $12, veggie plate $8 and glass of wine $9. Total w/o tax n tip $123. Well worth it. All the staff were very knowledgable about all the items on the menu. Parking is difficult.  Outside seating is available.

data.title: small classic restaurant
data.text: The menu is sophisticated and well executed.  The wine list is exceptional.  Not inexpensive but very worth the visit.

data.title: Elegance and warmth
data.text: The food is excellent and it is nice that Gainesville has such an elegant restaurant.  The servers are knowledgeable and helpful.  The owner Manuel adds a special warmth.  It a small, quiet space.

data.title: Great Upscale Dining
data.text: If you are celebrating a special occasion, or like delicious Italian food go to Manuel's. It is a small restaurant downtown, so make a reservation. I got the vanilla macadamia nut chicken and it was amazing! I have never had anything like it. They have an extensive wine menu.

data.title: Amazing
data.text: I've been here numerous and will continue to come back. The food is flavorful and melts in your mouth. The service is outstanding. The only negative aspect of this restaurant is how early you must make the reservations. Walk ins are welcome but typically have to take the seats outside. Nevertheless, I make my reservations two weeks in advanced and I enjoy it every time I visit. The owner walks around and greets all the tables- makes you feel appreciated and valued as a customer. This is the only place I can come to and simply try everything on the menu because the food is so good!!

data.title: Ben is awesome
data.text: We had a wonderful time with my girlfriends parents. Ben was our waiter and he was very knowledgeable about the wine and the menu selections. He took the time to ask about the wine preferences and was so observant of our needs.... I seriously can't say enough about the atmosphere and the food and the service/ whenever we have anyone in town we just hope they have an opening but most of all- that BEN will be our server! He's the real reason we come month after month!!!
